name: Classic Croissant
description: A buttery, flaky croissant baked to golden perfection.

reviews.comment: This croissant is absolutely delicious! The buttery texture is perfection.
I love the flaky texture of this croissant. It's a true treat!
The croissant is so fresh and flavorful. It's a must-try!
